headline: Can Visa Capture More Holiday Spend Through Link's Festive Rewards?
summary: V taps festive mall traffic through Link's Christmas rewards, aiming to drive holiday spending and boost transaction activity.

headline: American Express (AXP): Is the Current Valuation Justified After Recent Share Price Stability?
summary: American Express (AXP) stock has moved around 3% over the past week despite the absence of any major headline event. Investors appear to be weighing its recent performance and financial metrics as they evaluate potential opportunities. See our latest analysis for American Express. American Express has demonstrated strong momentum this year, with an 18.25% year-to-date share price return and a 16.87% total shareholder return over the past twelve months. headline: American Express and the International Downtown Association Foundation Honor 97 International Restaurants Making a Positive Impact in Local Communities with over $1.4M in Grants
summary: American Express and the International Downtown Association Foundation today announced the 2025 grantees of the Backing International Small Restaurants grant program, an initiative that honors restaurants that have demonstrated a positive impact in their communities. Now in its fourth year, the initiative will award over $1.4 million to 97 small and independently owned restaurants across 14 cities in the UK, Mexico, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Canada, Spain, and France. headline: This Is My Favorite Warren Buffett Stock, and It's One of His Biggest Bets (Hint: It's Not Apple or Alphabet)
